title: Most commonly reported types of cyber crime 2018
summary: This bar chart has 11 columns on the x axis representing Cyber Incidents, and Number of complaints in each Cyber Incidents on the y axis.
The Number of complaints is appeared to be the highest at Cyber Incidents Non-payment/Non-delivery and lowest at Cyber Incidents Spoofing.
The highest Cyber Incidents Non-payment/Non-delivery has 49547.0 more Number of complaints than the lowest Cyber Incidents Spoofing.
min_summary: This bar chart has 11 columns on the x axis representing Cyber Incidents, and Number of complaints in each Cyber Incidents on the y axis.
The maximum Number of complaints 65116.0 is found at Cyber Incidents Non-payment/Non-delivery and the minimum is found at Spoofing where Cyber Incidents is 15569.0.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 11 columns on the x axis representing Cyber Incidents, and Number of complaints in each Cyber Incidents on the y axis.
The Number of complaints is appeared to be the highest at Cyber Incidents Non-payment/Non-delivery and lowest at Cyber Incidents Spoofing.
The highest Cyber Incidents Non-payment/Non-delivery has 49547.0 more Number of complaints than the lowest Cyber Incidents Spoofing.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of complaints for 11 number of Cyber Incidentss.
The Number of complaints is appeared to be the highest at Cyber Incidents Non-payment/Non-delivery and lowest at Cyber Incidents Spoofing.
Cyber Incidents Extortion has the second highest value for Number of complaints.
There is a difference of 49547.0 between the maximum Cyber Incidents Non-payment/Non-delivery and minimum Cyber Incidents Spoofing.
Number of complaints at Cyber Incidents Non-payment/Non-delivery is 65116.0 , second place is Extortion at 51146.0, and thirdly is Personal data breach at 50642.0.
The average Number of complaints in all 11 Cyber Incidentss is 30505.36.
